column2: Great Coffee, good and reasonably priced, good. Lovely quiet and relaxed atmosphere. Was helped by a gentleman that was manning the register, food and drinks and was knocking it out. Cash only though but there is an ATM as a heads up.

Church Street Cafe received 5 stars only because I was allowed to use their restroom. I enjoy offering high remarks when deserved. The Cafe has terrible coffee. Bitter, Strong, and indigestible. My heart sank even lower when I received my plain bagel. Lathered in between the bagel was silky, salty cream cheese. 🤢 Yucky. Help Noah's or NY.

5 out of 5 to (1) single asian gentleman who runs the show by himself! In a very nicely kept Cafe placed on the warm n sunny place on market so I giv it up to the dude that's running the joint every Friday I'm there! Good jop.

Excellent customer service. The owner is very accommodating and personable. Coffees and snacks are good. Fresh OJ. Free Wi-Fi. There is an ATM inside. Artsy walls. The bathroom is one of the best I have seen in the history of all restaurants: clean, modern, installed with a bidet! Outside seating. Limited inside seatings, due to covid, with a power outlet, which is extremely helpful during the pandemic restrictions.
Proprietor is really nice! Their veggie egg bagel is so good and their latte was pretty nice too! Would def be back!
Pretty great spot to meet up with friends or work/study. Nice decors and many tables. Not impressive with the drinks' quality however.

So many drink options to choose from! I got the boba blended matcha and it was delicious. The barista is funny and it’s a great atmosphere, I imagine this is a great spot to meet friends. It’s cash only so be prepared for that. Definitely coming back. ☺️
Staff very cordial and patient. Sandwich & latte was good. I found a cafe for this area of city!

Wonderful owner- friendly & kind. Coffee the great. Lots of yummy pastries & bagels- free WiFi . Cozy place with enough space to relax ( Covid rules) small tables out front.friendly neighbor - not intusive . You can hang out as long as you want-- peaceful energy-- nice spot to enjoy Great coffee & treats and relax & can get work done or just play games on iPad etc. Come check it out-
The BEST Boba Matcha Latte! They blend it with the ice like a smoothie! DELICIOUS and super friendly! Charming and quaint!!! I go EVERY day for the boba matcha latte! There is nothing better!!!
Disgusting pastries.  Reheated from frozen and left out for days? Worst lemon bar of my life.
Can’t wait to come back. Cozy vibe.
Great neighborhood cafe!  Friendly service. Yummy coffee, pastries and great authentic  Banh Mi sandwiches.  Cozy atmosphere with local crowd.  Best cafe in Church St/Castro neighborhoods.
Great local coffee shop. Good drinks and breakfast, and friendly owners who make you feel welcome to stay and work from the cafe.

A lovely, quaint neighborhood coffee shop, with a comforting atmosphere. The store keeper was an interesting personality. There were also quite a few notable patrons. The breakfast menu was rather meager. I ordered a croissant, which was pretty tasty even though maybe too greasy. There is a plenty of power outlets. Before coming to work, keep in mind that it's 1) cash only and 2) the wifi code is only good for two hours.
Great place to get a fast egg sandwich. Coffee is okay, service is really quick. Coffee+sandwich is 8.50 about

Love this spot for a stroll in the morning to get coffee and a bagel, they also have great pastries, juices, and Banh Mi! Wanted to leave a review because the owner is so kind and it's places like this that keep San Francisco charming.

Nice, quiet place to meet a friend and catch up or get some work done. Good coffee and tea selection but it's cash only! There is an ATM but it's rather inconvenient to have to get $20+ fees for a $2.50 cup of tea.

I'm a regular customer here - the employees got my order down to the point where they just confirm I'm getting the same thing and start making it as I walk through the door.  All of the staff I've interacted with are beyond friendly. Sure, there's a language "barrier" at times, but it doesnt bother me. Just try to speak clearly and calmly repeat yourself if needed. The iced coffee is drinkable, but not my favorite. The bagel sandwiches are golden though!!

Pretty atmosphere, but the food and drinks are really subpar. The scone I purchased tasty days old. Also, the wifi is slow and time limited. Great that they are open late, so an option if everything else is closed.

Lovely staff and owner, they are precious Best tofu banh mi in San Francisco, can be made vegan by asking for tomato spread instead of mayo Drinks can be made vegan by asking for almond milk Cleanest bathroom in the city—great experience!

It's a quiet coffee place, with a healthy air flow..inside. There are tables for those who prefer out door..this place even has some gluten free treats..for people like me..their toilet room is clean, too. That is a big plus..besides the staff is sweet😊 …

Lots of seating, and most of the time not super busy. Plenty of space to work on your laptop. The people at the cash always seem a little indifferent and don't speak much. Do NOT order the bubble tea. They put the pearls in the fridge or something. Hard pearls sunk inside of the bland slush. Cash only! There is an old book store nearby in case you are bored.

Delicious Bahn mi! They offer coffee, boba tea, breakfast sandwiches too. I always see regulars sitting outside whenever I go. The vegetarian bahn mi is just as good as their meat options so it’s got something for everyone. Bring cash!

Nice place to hang out. You have to ask the cashier for a Wi-Fi password each time you go. Clean bathrooms. The wait staff are efficient but don't seem to take any pleasure at all and interacting with other human beings.  They look sad and sullen.
Best breakfast sandwich in town

This was my go to place. But since more trendy places opened up the neighborhood Church Street Cafe now seems old and dated. Most of the employees don't speak good English, they don't do cold brew, they are too tolerant with homeless, employees spend too much time behind the counter and not cleaning tables or the condiment station. They also have horrible coffee handling practices. Brewing new coffee on top of old, letting coffee sit for hours, not grinding fresh espresso per drink, and not offering multiple brews.  Their tea menu is a mix of every tea bag available in San Francisco. I question how fresh they are and the quality.  Church Street Cafe needs to modernize quickly else it will go down with the aging population that holds it afloat.

Yummy coffee. Good variety of pastries. Even have hard boiled eggs for a healthy snack. More importantly their bathroom is part of the Access2Go and let me tell you, that is an experience in an of itself. Touchless everything from bathroom, flushing, hand washing, soap dispensing, hand drying and finally exiting. Everything touchless. Amazing.

The owner and the atmosphere remain my favorite features these past few years. In 2008 I used to go every week, and this year I'm back to the same habit. Happily, nothing I loved has changed (not even the prices as far as I can tell) and the "problem" with homeless seems to have been dealt with. I love how productive I am here!
Service is great. Definitely reasonable prices for all your morning rush needs plus banh mi sandwiches and tapioca drinks. Family-owned & operated, a true mom+pop.

Clean and quiet with plenty of seating. The coffee is passable with lots of different choices. Cash only, but there is an ATM inside. You must ask the barista for a paper with your temporary wifi login and password and the wifi is pretty slow. You also ask the barista for a barcode to scan to use the bathroom.

Absolutely love this place. Fair prices on everything on the menu, food and coffee are superb, and an all around great vibe. I highly recommend this place if you're looking for a nice spot to do some work or just want to kick back for a little bit!

Church St. Café is a pretty nice place.  Fresh pastries, hot made-to-order bagel sandwiches, good fresh coffee.  Kudos to them for using ceramic cups for "for here" coffee.  I just wish that they had pull-down shading for their windows when that morning sun comes in their windows.  It can be blinding sitting there.

I've been coming here since college (formerly called Muddy Waters), and have witnessed the change in ownership. Conveniently located near Church Station, it is an excellent place to duck into for several cups of tea,  a visit to the loo, and/or to immediately dive into that just-picked-up book from Aardvark's. New owners are super, and hence the reason I still continue to wander in. When I manage to snag a corner table, I park myself for hours to get some work done, or catch up on offline/online reading.

Family owned. Excellent location half a block from Muni Church street train station. Delicious coffee. Great ambiance. Good cookies, sandwiches, candy, biscotti, bagels, cakes and pies. Friendly ambiance and very reasonable prices.2 tables out doors. WiFi
Nice place. It was not be noisy like some cafes and a good variety of food and beverages. The employee was a bit  distant but that's ok. Bathroom was unusually clean - big 😀 for that. …
Great Cafe, only cash though :/

Unassuming little shop with polite staff. 5.00 will get you a cream cheese bagel and small drip coffee. WiFi is free (ask them for a login) and decent speed. Lots of seating but limited power outlets. I will come back.

Kudos for opening pass 6 pm. Place to hang out with friends and take in some sweet desserts or tea.  Mellow and decompress from work.  Forget about local bars.  Grab a cookie or two. That lemon bar sure looks yummy (4.95).  Bun mi sandwich.
It is coffee shop within table inside. My price is fairly. Only cash no credit card. The food is alright.

I walked past this place a few times, thinking how lovely it looked inside. But when I finally went in, I was pretty disappointed. Not a great range, uninterested barrista, awkwardly passworded wifi, and worst, you needed an app on your phone just to use the restroom!
Good strawberry boba
Great bahn mi sandwiches.  Hank makes a wide variety of coffees, teas and bubble drinks.
Cash only, and ATM was down so had to go down the street to use another business's machine. Other than that, standard quality I would expect from an SF cafe.
This is my favorite Cafe in town, they have really strong and great coffee, with a nice atmosphere. They're open pretty late till 10 p.m. which is really nice.
Love this place! The owner / staff is so friendly. The boba Tea is awesome and so are the protein balls

Go there, enjoy a fresh bagel, a really good Coffee and listen carefully! You'll get important informations about the area around worth visiting. Off the beaten path! The guy behind the counter loves his Job!  Thx !!!
Friendly staff with your basic Cafe items, but awesome! Well lit with comfortable surroundings for studying and the fanciest restroom I've ever been into!
Quiet, neighborhoody place for coffee and sandwiches. Nice owner & staff.  My favorite in the neighborhood.

I got my chai order wrong and they denied to make a new one and blamed me. Rude service. (Friday 8.30 pm). Also, consider this place only allows cash. Atm  2.75$ extra charge. It's unfortunate because the place is really nice.

- Lots of tables but can get crowded in the evenings - Cash only, but there's an ATM inside - Free wifi but you have to ask for a code that expires after 2 hours - One block away from Church Street Station - Good for getting work done - Lots of outlets at the tables around the perimeter
Wonderful food, extremely friendly & knowledgeable staff, overall a memorable & cozy cafe.  Perfect for a solo meal or great with a few people.
Coffee is subpar, tea comes in a pint glass and the croissants are defrosted. 0/10 would not recommend to a friend. Good if you lost your tastebuds.
Good banh mi and Thai iced tea! Friendly service
Went there to use the new Good2Go bathroom and found it to be completely spotless. Seems like a great atmosphere inside and friendly staff.
Decent coffee, great sandwiches, good bobas. Quality of baked goods is poor. Good place to read and kick back.
Good coffee, great price low key and kind of SF boho stylish with interesting mix of people.
Good coffee, friendly vibe, clean restrooms, convenient wifi. Great place to chill, work, meet friends, or just people watch.
A very much "locals" place. Good selection of bagels and small breakfast food. Good for a couple of hours of work and coffee.
Remember- They only take cash. Bagels and chai tea latte are great.
One of my favorite coffee shop.. Great place to unwind meet people work/study Great Service Great food Great coffee Highly recommend
This is true to the description, very low key and a great respite from the hustle and bustle. Nice coffee and treats and polite service.
Great coffee and snacks. Overly complicated bathroom though. Who would have thought you would need a qr code to relieve yourself?
Nice space, some tables are a bit low so can be hard to work there for an extended time.  Free wi-fi with purchase.
Premium Soy Chai Latte. You're welcome. (It's sweet so ask for alternative levels of sweetness if you want)
Friendly owner and nice location to sit down and enjoy coffee.
Phenomenal cafe that is open late. Come in, order some stuff work away. Just wish it wasn’t cash only.
Nice location, reasonable selection of food.  Time limited wifi that I wasn't able to get working.  Plenty of outlets.
..love the vibes, not overcrowded, not uncomfortable, interesting toilet in restroom, good service and selsctions.. good for first dates
While the coffee is awful, I like the bunh mi sandwiches and croissant with egg/tomato/lettuce. Great place to work.
I love this cafe. clean bathrooms, indoor and curb seating.quick service. wonderful cafe
Very good sandwiches and baked goods.  Nice quite place too get some work done
Surprisingly delicious bahn mi sandwich and reasonably priced boba. Otherwise, just another coffee house.
Good atmosphere, usually has a trendy crowd. Free internet and the price is nice.
Nice laidback inexpensive place with friendly staff. Try the banh mi, it's really tasty!
Wonderful place to relax and have coffee. Good food.
What kind of monster makes a macchiato with half a cup of foam. Worst coffee I have ever paid for hands down.
Surprisingly the only place around to open up earlier than 7 for coffee in the area.  Doesn't take card though so be prepared.
This is bare bones kind of cafe. I was meeting some folks and didn't attend to it much except to get the impression that it didn't have much on offer.
Plenty of space and decent coffee. Large menu and not bad prices
Quiet, spacious. Great place to bury your face in your phone or laptop.
Their almond croissants are one of the best I've tried so far.
Hank is the owner Hes there great man love the place close to Dolores park three blks
Nice quiet place to catch up with friends. Good prices. Friendly staff :-)
Surprisingly great chicken banh mi. The bread is nicely toasted too.
Very intimate atmosphere clean very accommodating to their customers great atmosphere
Very relaxing environment. Batista was very polite
Nice decor, good service, and terrible drinks.  They are cash only.
Good environment for work, coffee is not great.
One of the best coffee places in the city.
Great coffee cake... tastes homemade!
Excellent service with great coffee and sweets.
Open until 10pm. There's always space to seat and people to watch.
Great staff good food NOISEY blenders
Great service and great spicy chai latte!
Not great coffee, and free WiFi setup is weird
one of the disappearing SF coffee shops. Enjoy while it lasts!
They have awesome Banh Mi here!
Best Boba and Banh mi sandwiches.
Decent coffee, fair prices, cozy place
Employees are friendly enough & deal well with obnoxious customers like myself!
Like the flavor n environment
Great little space to come and work late
Delicious lattes, great atmosphere.
Good coffee great bathroom
Good place for coffee ,meet friends
Calm ambiance and friendly services.
Good late night study spot.
Good coffee convenient location
Bahn mi was great!
Gross microwaved food, and rude OWNER...
good food, good service
Great staff and art!
those of us with terrible laptop batteries
Wierd enrgy and wierd staff
Comfy, but unspectacular
Friendly, family business.
High tech bathroom
Love it place!
Nice quiet place
Good coffee
Decent coffee
Quiet coffee
Effective for a quick lunch
I got laid cause this together
